Description.name: Description0
Description.content: The target builds the .zip-archive as it is downloaded when getting the OpenCms release for installation.

Description.name: Description0
Description.content: The target builds the opencms.war file as deployed to the servlet container.

Description.name: Description0
Description.content: The target builds the .zip file for the respective module, as you use it for module import.

Description.name: Description0
Description.content: The target builds the Java library (.jar) for the specified module.

Description.name: Description0
Description.content: The target removes all build results, i.e., cleans up.
